mapper.insert: insert into e_wx_mini_game ( id, nickname, head_img_url, qr_code_img_url, need_sign, open_type, create_time, online_time, shelve_state, cover_img_url, app_id, star_num, is_handpicked ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrCodeImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needSign}, #{openType}, #{createTime}, #{onlineTime}, #{shelveState}, #{coverImgUrl}, #{appId}, #{starNum}, IFNULL(#{isHandpicked},0) )
mapper.update: update e_wx_mini_game set nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img_url = #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qr_code_img_url = #{qrCodeImgUrl}, need_sign = #{needSign}, open_type = #{openType}, create_time = #{createTime}, online_time = #{onlineTime}, shelve_state = #{shelveState}, cover_img_url = #{coverImgUrl}, app_id = #{appId}, star_num = #{starNum}, is_handpicked = IFNULL(#{isHandpicked},0) where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM e_wx_mini_game ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT
FROM e_wx_mini_game ORDER BY id DESC limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT
FROM e_wx_mini_game WHERE shelve_state = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(online_time,'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') <= NOW() ORDER BY need_sign DESC ,online_time DESC , create_time DESC

SELECT
from e_wx_mini_game where is_handpicked = 1 and shelve_state = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(online_time,'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') <= NOW() ORDER BY need_sign DESC ,online_time DESC , create_time DESC limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
